DEMOGRAPHICS.description: Key=Value lines. Sex must be 'male' or 'female' if stated.

VITALS.description: ADM/DC vitals in Key=Value; numeric-only; canonical vitals only.

LABS.description: ADM/DC labs in Key=Value; numeric-only; canonical labs only. Use canonical names: WBC, Hemoglobin, Hematocrit, Platelet, Sodium, Potassium, Creatinine, BUN, Glucose, Bicarbonate. Alias mapping: Urea N/UreaN/Blood Urea Nitrogen -> BUN; HCO3/Total CO2/CO2/Bicarb -> Bicarbonate.

MEDICATIONS.description: Integral flags/counts only (Medication Count/New Medications Count/Polypharmacy/Anticoagulation/Insulin Therapy/Opioid Therapy/Diuretic Therapy). Do not list medication names.

PROCEDURES.description: Integral keys only (no imaging/test inventory): Any Procedure, Surgery, Dialysis, Mechanical Ventilation. Use yes/no for Any Procedure and Surgery; Dialysis in {decided, started, done, cancelled, no}; Mechanical Ventilation numeric days or no. Use 'not stated' if absent.

UTILIZATION.description: Key=Value lines. Prior Admissions 12mo/ED Visits 6mo/Days Since Last Admission/Current Length of Stay. Numeric only. Use 'not stated' if absent.

DISPOSITION.description: Key=Value lines. Discharge Disposition (Home/Home with Services/SNF/Rehab/LTAC/Hospice/AMA), Mental Status (alert/confused/oriented/lethargic), Support Needs. Use 'not stated' if absent.
